message.name: ERR_PREEXISTING_TARGET_OF_SAME_IDENTITY
message.locale: The id %1s is already used by the allocation target named %2s.

message.name: ERR_ALLOCATIONTARGET_XRV_NAME_EXIST
message.locale: An allocation target already exists with this allocation target name.

message.name: ERR_ALLOCATIONTARGET_XRV_NAME_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: An allocation target with the name "%1s" already exists. Duplicate allocation names are not allowed.
